item.title: Huber Regressor
item.description:
Motivation towards Huber Regressor

One of the first issue I had to deal with while working with Ordinary least Squares (OLS) Linear Regression was the impact which extreme values had on my model. To illustrate the nature of this problem, let me take a sample dataset consisting of mileage of â€¦
item.dc:creator: Kavitha Shashidharan
